company_name: Panasonic Gobel Life Solutions Sales Indonesia
recommended_degree: Desain Komunikasi Visual, Ilmu Komunikasi, Hubungan Masyarakat Dan Komunikasi Digital, Komunikasi, Desain Grafis (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: 1. Content Creation -> Creating content for social media (Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp Community), writing captions, creating short videos, and promotional visuals. 2. Brand Communication -> Assisting in writing advertising copy and newsletters and coordinating content with the design team. 3. Market & Trend Research -> Observing digital trends, competitors, and consumer behavior for content strategy insights.
